strings:
<voice_0x010010B9><se_low>Felix: What ho! Finally made it back, I see.
And you managed to give my old chum a leg up.
<voice_0x010010BA><se_low>Felix: That strange tree where you met him has been known since ancient times as the Tree of Styx.
<voice_0x010010BB><se_low>Felix: It's all too bally easy to lose your way around it, not realising that your innings is over.

<voice_0x010010BC><se_low>Felix: But now the old bean's realised what's
happened to him and he's safely on his way
to the afterlife.

<voice_0x010010BD><se_low>Felix: You know, he...Baumren...was the first
sabrecat ever to open up his heart to me.
Absolutely terrific chap!
<voice_0x010010BE><se_low>Felix: It's thanks to him that I've got where I am today.
<voice_0x010010BF><se_low>Felix: And that's precisely why I couldn't leave the job unattended to go and help the old boy meself.

<voice_0x010010C0><se_low>Felix: ...Hm? What am I doing?
Of course! I haven't explained yet, eh!?

<voice_0x010010C1><se_low>Felix: I'm the chairman of the Great Sabrecat Trust!
I know! Why don't I make you a member?
It's the least I can do after all your help!

<voice_0x010010C2><se_low>Felix: You have this!
It shows you're one of us.
<Cap><leader> receives a bell, proof of membership of the Great Sabrecat Trust.

<voice_0x010010C3><se_low>Felix: The bell is your proof of membership.
It'll call a nearby sabrecat if you ring it in the right place.

<voice_0x010010C4><se_low>Felix: Hm? What's the bell called?
Well, it doesn't really have a name...
I suppose that'll make it a bit of a pig to use, eh?

<voice_0x010010C5><se_low>Felix: Right ho!
How about we call it ‘Baumren's bell’, eh?
In memory of a good friend and a fine old gent!
<Cap><leader> receives Baumren's bell and puts it in the bag.

<voice_0x010010C6><se_low>Felix: Thanks for your help! Remember now,
always keep the sabrecats in your heart, what!
